subject: p10410641
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is a mild decrease in extent of the right pneumothorax. The pneumothorax has now a dimension of approximately 1 cm. No evidence of tension. Unchanged position of the bilateral pigtail catheters in the pleural space.
